mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (Q_NO, ID, P_NO, QUESTION) VALUES(SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{p_no}, #{question})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET ANSWER = #{answer}, A_REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE Q_NO = #{q_no}
mapper.select: SELECT PQ.Q_NO Q_NO, U.NICKNAME NICKNAME, PQ.QUESTION QUESTION, PQ.Q_REGDATE Q_REGDATE, PQ.ANSWER ANSWER, PQ.A_REGDATE A_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(Q IDX_QNA) */ Q.Q_NO Q_NO, Q.ID ID, Q.P_NO P_NO, Q.QUESTION QUESTION, Q.Q_REGDATE Q_REGDATE, Q.ANSWER ANSWER, Q.A_REGDATE A_REGDATE FROM PARTY P, QNA Q WHERE P.P_NO = Q.P_NO ) PQ, USERS U WHERE PQ.ID = U.ID AND PQ.P_NO = #{p_no}
